mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE DELETE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, MGR_NICKNAME, VIEW_COUNT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - ENROLL_DT < 1 THEN TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'HH:MI') END ENROLL_DT
FROM NOTICE
JOIN MANAGER USING(MGR_NO) WHERE DELETE_STATUS = 'N'
ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') ENROLL_DT,
VIEW_COUNT, MGR_NICKNAME, MGR_NO
FROM NOTICE JOIN MANAGER USING(MGR_NO)
WHERE NOTICE_NO = ${noticeNo} AND DELETE_STATUS = 'N'
